name: the Story of a Mother - Pre Alpha
name_original: the Story of a Mother - Pre Alpha
description:
A young man returns to his hometown after the start of a brutal civil war, following the outbreak of a terrible plague. He is sick, and needs a cure that is held at the heart of the city of Odense, but to get there he needs to work his way through a militia, an army and a very determined resistance.

Play as the fatefull young man, who needs to make his way back home.

Controls:

You control the character by using the arrow keys or the WASD keys.
